ygData.subject: shadow knight npcs
ygData.msgSnippet: shadow knight npcs are so nasty because A) they are not afraid to use their HT (in fact they use it the second they see you.. ouchies!) and B) they get to
ygData.messageBody:
shadow knight npcs are so nasty because A) they are not afraid to use their
HT (in fact they use it the second they see you.. ouchies!) and B) they get
to cheat and use HT much more often than players. they are also typically
unique mobs, which gives them another power boost ;)

by the by, add Shria to the list of Cool GMs on fennin ro. that puts her
right up there with citrine and.. well nobody else so far. but i'm working
on the list, really i am :)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
